mapper.insert: insert into history (user_num, busi_num, log_in_out_time, log_in_out_type) values (#{user_num}, #{busi_num}, now(), 1)
insert into history (user_num, busi_num, log_in_out_time, log_in_out_type) values (#{user_num}, #{busi_num}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select * from history where (user_num = #{user_num} AND log_in_out_type = '1') OR (busi_num = #{busi_num} AND log_in_out_type = '1') order by history_num desc limit 3
select * from history where (user_num = #{user_num} AND log_in_out_type = '0') OR (busi_num = #{busi_num} AND log_in_out_type = '0') order by history_num desc limit 3
